title: experiencing a lot of packet loss in games today
body:
So been trying to play some league today but im experiencing a rather odd amount of packet loss and ping spiking. my usual ping is around 50 ms, which really should be lower considering how close i am to the servers but thats a side point, but has been spiking up a lot getting to and jumping between 70 to 150 ms randomly. I checked out my network analyzer while i was in a training game mode and the network speed wasnt fluctuating much at all even during the packet loss and higher pings. im confused as to what's going on, it isnt like regular lag but would be better described as just a bunch of packet loss.

Anyone with any ideas on what might be happening?

replies.body: [It would be useful to consolidate these threads](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/1VluGcrg-lag-spikes-in-rankeds)

Hmmmmm packet loss can be pretty hard to deal with sometimes. Mostly due to the fact that it takes place outside of your network, and caused by how your ISP is routing your connection. Make sure to check with your ISP to make sure there aren't any current issues. If not, go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can see what's going on with those network logs!

Haven't been to LoL forums in 6 years but I logged in for the first time in a while to say I am having the same issues. Every other game I play is fine but I am getting constant 200-300 ms ping on League. It has been at 77ms for the last year but it suddenly changed. BTW OP, did you get a windows 10 update recently on your computer?
